alert.note: Alert for Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 9:43AM PST until January 04 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 to 6 inches, with ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Western Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall will be to east of Bonneville Dam.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
